General.Name: Mountain Crest Acquisition IV Corp Unit
General.Description: Mountain Crest Acquisition Corp. IV does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
